title: Can a rioter finally give some clarification in this?
body:
Are we still getting that Karthus emote or did it get cancelled?
You people at riot really arent transparant with this. We get some vague "it'll come out dont worry" type answer (if we're lucky, you ignore 99% of the questions about it.) Just tell us if it's coming out or not already. Why is releasing one single emote that's already done and was supposed to come out months ago so damn hard for you people?
It's actually starting to piss me off. The one time my fav champ gets some love and it gets pulled away from us for no reason whatsoever.

https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-vbqJS8Uv9SM/WyLFWG9l1FI/AAAAAAABBeM/RSrq9mEoMXIkWsWW3cH7nXUdIrqXaxoSQCLcBGAs/s1600/ee57b11cdd0a060a.png

What's wrong with this emote? it's perfect. Why did this not get released?
